author: Spoon University
title: 11 dump cake recipes you should try this winter | Campus Life News for College Students | USA TODAY College

organizations.name: campus life news for college students

text:
SEND EMAIL 
Even though “ dump cake ” might be one of the worst names ever given to a dessert, they’re delicious and super easy to make. You basically just dump ingredients into a pan, stir them around, and bake. Just trust us on this one. 1. Banana Split Dump Cake 
Banana creme instant pudding mix is the secret ingredient to give this yummy cake its not-too-sweet taste. Recipe here . 2. Pecan Cobbler Dump Cake 
This is the easiest “ pecan pie ” dessert that you will ever make. The brown sugary sauce keeps this cake moist and delicious. 3. Triple Chocolate Pudding Dump Cake 
With only 6 ingredients, this chocolate cake will become your new favorite go-to. Recipe here . 4. Strawberry Dump Cake 
This dump cake is even easier than you imagined- no stirring required. Recipe here . 5. Chocolate Peanut Butter Dump Cake 
This cake is seriously amazing. Perfect for all the Reese’s addicts out there. 6. Funfetti Dump Cake 
A true party in your mouth. Recipe here . 7. Hot Chocolate Dump Cake 
Add peppermint for extra holiday spirit. Recipe here . 8. Candy Apple Dump Cake 
This is not your usual apple recipe . You’ll have trouble sharing. 9. Apple Spice Dump Cake 
You’ll get your apple pie fix in half the time. Recipe here . 10. White Chocolate and Cherry Dump Cake 
A delicious twist on the classic cherry dump cake. Recipe here . 11. Red Velvet Cherry Dump Cake 
Because red velvet makes everything better. Recipe here This article originally appeared on Spoon University and was written by Emma Smith and Serena Mathew. Spoon University is a food network for our generation, where all the content is produced by college students. They cover everything from simple recipes and local restaurants to dining hall hacks and healthy living tips. F or more, check out the Spoon University site , or like their page on Facebook.
